ygData.subject: Re: Confused...
ygData.msgSnippet: Sometimes back at Innoruuk, sometimes at prexus. The whole guild is a bit gila gila...... So to be safe, start at Innoruuk. Gnomes and Erudite Necros have bad
ygData.messageBody:
Sometimes back at Innoruuk, sometimes at prexus. The whole guild is a
bit gila gila...... So to be safe, start at Innoruuk. Gnomes and Erudite
Necros have bad factions within their own city IOWs, they buy things
more expensive.

They won't be KOS by thier own people unless you worsen the faction
rating.

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> im a little confused now... so r u guys gonna stay on ya old server?
> or move on to a new one? n whose gonna be on the new server? can
> someone compile a list or something? i think at least u know who to
> look for when u get online...also, from some readup... i noticed that
> the Erudite Necro is not much better of the Dark Elf... as they have
> to choose some evil god as well... also... from the history of eq...
> Erudite Necros are not accepted by their own people... unless Dark
> Elves... at least they are... cheers,Fredp/s : pls correct me if im
> wrong,
